title: Lovers Beyond the Mirror - Novel Updates
author: 휘드리안
description:
Born as an illegitimate child of the king, in the midst of severe persecution, Seriana, who grew up with scars.

However, she had one secret no one knew.

As she stumbled upon this in the warehouse of a mansion in her childhood—

…The fact that she has a crush on the man in the ‘Magic Mirror.’

Then one day, ‘Chaitun,’ a sandy desert kingdom of the barbarians, crossed the border and threatened Seriana’s country of ‘Rajen.’

Because of that, the King of Rajen decides to dedicate Seriana to the King of Chaitun, Vaisha.

One day she spent her days resigning, Seriana meets the man in the mirror, like fate in the garden of the royal family.

What’s even more surprising is that the man’s identity is none other than…

The King of Chaitun, Vaisha.

A desert land full of scorching heat.

A dazzling epic, drawn by the two of them, unfolds!>
